channel.title: Ladders and Jumping
channel.description:
There's bound to be many threads of this. I'm deleting my account after this too, or just never coming back so I don't care about your "lets suck up to the admins" replies.
The ladders are such a tedious process to use in this mod, I understand it's a mod blah blah blah. No. You've had at least 8/9 years? to make this game and you couldn't fix the ladders in testing? I just tried to attempt the Tentacle part (which is piss easy) but with these ladders it's SO fucking impossible to do. The same with jumping, half the time Gordon doesn't make the complete jump becuase how high you jump in this game is bullshit. FYI: If you're trying to jump onto a crate, you have to crouch the moment after pressing jump.
Fuck this game.

item.title: Ladders and Jumping
item.dc:creator: Langenscheiss
item.description:
I actually had some situations where Gordon simply would not jump off the ladder.

Read full topic

item.title: Ladders and Jumping
item.dc:creator: Executor
item.description:
The ladders work exactly like they do in HL2 and the episodes, I had no problems with any of them. Jump height is also the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Ladders and Jumping
item.dc:creator: Insomniak
item.description:
The ladders are easy to use. Press the USE key (E) near a ladder and you get on the ladder. Then when you’re ready to get off the ladder, press the USE key again.

Read full topic

item.title: Ladders and Jumping
item.dc:creator: LeFuckThisGame
item.description:
OH WOW, YOU SURE SHOWED ME. SHIT ASSASSIN, YOU MUST BE A REAL TROLL.

Anyway, I got past the Tentacle ages ago, just took more patience than I had prior anticipated. There’s not too much other things other than sometimes there’s this odd severe lag that I’ll get when starting up the game and I had one crash.

Read full topic

item.title: Ladders and Jumping
item.dc:creator: LeFuckThisGame
item.description:
There’s bound to be many threads of this. I’m deleting my account after this too, or just never coming back so I don’t care about your “lets suck up to the admins” replies.

The ladders are such a tedious process to use in this mod, I understand it’s a mod blah blah blah. No. You’ve had at least 8/9 years? to make this game and you couldn’t fix the ladders in testing? I just tried to attempt the Tentacle part (which is piss easy) but with these ladders it’s SO fucking impossible to do. The same with jumping, half the time Gordon doesn’t make the complete jump becuase how high you jump in this game is bullshit. FYI: If you’re trying to jump onto a crate, you have to crouch the moment after pressing jump.

Fuck this game.
